title: Alice in Wonderland Monument in Central Park
content:
What is the typeface used on the plaques around the Alice in Wonderland Monument in Central Park?? I feel like it's similar to Garamond but it's more condensed and the serifs are a little different. Any suggestions?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023124712im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_00451_5937.jpg)
author: LisaHan

comments.content:
Which version of Garamond are you comparing it against? If you [CLICK THIS LINK](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023124712/http:/www.identifont.com/similar?2F4) you'll see there are quite a few different cuts of Garamond. ;)

The stone cutter may have also taken a few liberties in adjusting the letterforms and serifs a touch.
